瘖字的基本解释

瘖
yīn
同“喑”①。

瘖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於金切，平侵，影。］
“闇4”的被通假字。
(1)同“喑”。嗓子哑，不能出声；失音。
(2)哑巴，哑子。
(3)“陰”的古字。

瘖字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　瘖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页777第13
【唐韻】於今切【集韻】【韻會】於金切【正韻】於禽切，?音音。【說文】不能言病。【釋名】瘖，唵然無聲也。【禮·王制】瘖聾跛躃斷者侏儒，百工各以其器食之。【疏】瘖謂口不能言。【史記·淮隂侯傳】吟而不言，不如瘖聾之指麾也。【淮南子·主術訓】故皐陶瘖而為大理，天下無虐?。　又蟲名。【揚子·方言】?謂之寒蜩。寒蜩。瘖蜩也。　又【集韻】於禁切，音䕃。痛劇也。　又【韻彙小補】古文陰字。註詳阜部八畫。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, flat invasion, shadow. ]
"Dark 4" was passed falsely.
(1) Same as "喑". The voice is dumb, unable to speak; aphonia.
(2) Dumb, dumb.
(3) The ancient word "yin".

[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　瘖; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 777 13
[Tang Yun] Yu Jinqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Yu Jinqie [Zheng Yun] Yu Qinqie,? Yinyin. [Speaking text] Can't say sick. 【Release name】Sickness, oh, there is no sound. 【Rite·Royal System】The dwarf, the deaf, lame, and the dwarf, each of Baigong feeds on its utensils. 【Sparse】The scrofula is said to be unable to speak. [Historical Records · Huaiyin Hou Chuan] Yin without words is not as good as the deaf finger. 【Huainanzi·Master Skill Training】Therefore, Tao Tao is Dali, and there is no abuse in the world.　 Also known as insects. [Yangtze Dialect]? It's called cold. Chilly. Tillers are also.　[Jiyun] Yu Jinqie, the sound is 敃. It's painful too.　[Rhyme Hui Xiaobu] Ancient Chinese Yin Characters.
